outputs.output_descr: The Women Peace and Security Institute fully set up and functional providing capacity building to women in the areas of  peace negotiations, peacekeeping activities, gender based violence and policy issues. The skills, knowledge and competencies of Africa Region's women enhanced.

project_descr: Support to the Start-up of  Women, Peace and Security Institute in Africa based in Ghana in Cooperation with  Kofi Annan   Centre
project_title: Support to Women,Peace & Security in Africa
